title: How to Access Nvidia Overlay with GeForce Experience (2020)

steps.title: Launch your game.
steps.content: Launch your game. Since an overlay is intended to display on top of another full-screen program, you'll need to be running one in order to activate the overlay feature.

steps.title: Press and hold Alt+Z.
steps.content: Press and hold Alt + Z . If you don't see an overlay, you'll need to open the GeForce Experience application in the background and click the green Share button on the left side of Settings. [2] X Research source You can download GeForce Experience from https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/geforce-experience/download/ .

steps.title: Release the keys when you see the overlay appear.
steps.content: Release the keys when you see the overlay appear. You can click buttons in the options to take a screenshot, record video , and broadcast your game live to Twitch using the overlay in NVIDIA Share. [3] X Research source
